name: The Quest For Amethyst
description:
The Quest For Amethyst is a RPG game where the main character mission is to find and collect all 5 crystals of the Rare Amethyst hidden in this world.

The player will have to fight all the enemies and survive till end inside the world and also dungeons located to the other side of the portal.

Player Movement :-

WASD - movement

C - Attack

X -Shield

V - Arrow

E - Interact

Spacebar - Dash

There is also shop system present in the world which can be used to upgrade both weapon and health system and same crystals can be purchased by collecting the coins.

Features :-

Combat system

Defensive Shield

Arrow attack

Super Dash

Dark Dungeons

In-game Puzzles

This game is developed by Pyxwin Studios
